name: nfaltop
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1

stmt.origin: nfcxfr(s0, caltop(c0, c1), cpr(csn(c0), cpr(c0, csn(c1))))

body.origin:
|- wnfc(s0, caltop(c0, c1))

-| wnfc(s0, cpr(csn(c0), cpr(c0, csn(c1))))

-| wnfc(s0, cpr(csn(c0), cpr(c0, csn(c1))))

body.origin:

comment: Bound-variable hypothesis builder for alternate ordered pairs. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 25-Sep-2015.)
